title: Fix marks display, filtering, and grade calculation

requirements.text: Display raw marks as actual numbers (e.g., 73) instead of percentages (e.g., 92%) throughout the application

quotes: No you should represent raw marks in numbers say 73 not percentage say 92%

acceptanceCriteria: All marks displays show actual numerical scores (e.g., 73 out of 100)
Percentage calculations are only shown where explicitly needed for grade determination
ProgressView, SubjectAnalysisView, and NineScaleGradesView show raw marks correctly

requirements.text: Enable filtering of grades by both section and term in the grades view

quotes: should be present through filtering grades section and term

acceptanceCriteria: Users can filter academic entries by grade level, section, and term simultaneously
Filters work correctly in NineScaleGradesView and other relevant views
Filter state persists during user interaction within the same session

requirements.text: Fix 9-scale grading system calculation to work properly
acceptanceCriteria: 9-scale grades (1-9) are calculated correctly based on raw marks
Grades display properly in NineScaleGradesView with correct color coding
Grade calculations are consistent across all views

requirements.text: Calculate letter grades (A, B, C, etc.) based on percentage thresholds (e.g., 85% = A grade) rather than using grading system numbers

quotes: you should calculate grade in such a way that by not using grading system numbers but percentage say 85% A grade

acceptanceCriteria: Letter grades are derived from percentage calculations (marks/maxMarks * 100)
Grade thresholds are clearly defined (e.g., 90-100% = A+, 85-89% = A, etc.)
Grade display is consistent across AddMarksForm, ProgressView, and other components

constraints: Preserve existing academic entry data structure in backend
Maintain compatibility with existing Score and Score9Scale types
Do not modify grade-level max marks configuration logic
nonGoals: Changing the overall UI layout or navigation structure
Modifying authentication or user management features
